bhagavān āha /  sa tair bhikṣubhir bhikṣuḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ vastuparihāreṇa śayanāsanaparihāreṇa karmaparihāreṇa lābhaparihāreṇopasthāyakaparihāreṇa yasya bhikṣor uddiśyate prātimokṣaḥ /
